data: PAL Palliative Care Bowel Protocol - Osmotic (Module)
Please refer to guideline in reference text
For assessment if goal has not been met for 3 days
Intolerant to sennosides AND taking adequate fluids
10 g, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: oral liq
17 g, PO, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: powder
10 g, PO, BID, PRN constipation, drug form: oral liq
17 g, PO, BID, PRN constipation, drug form: powder
20 g, PO, BID, PRN constipation, drug form: oral liq
17 g, PO, BID, PRN constipation, drug form: powder
36 mg, PO, BID, PRN constipation, drug form: tab
Deselect all rectal measures below if neutropenic or thrombocytopenic
1 suppository, rectal, qdaily, PRN constipation, drug form: supp
